response.overview: Sexy strawberry blonde Luise may not be a "lark" – a morning lie-in is her favorite indulgence. But today, the dawn has other plans for her. Waking in her stylish apartment, dressed in a daring fishnet teddy with stockings and garters woven in, she finds an enticing gift left on her pillow. Intrigued, the Latvian babe opens her drapes, letting in the sunlight to take a closer look at her new toy, and her curiosity soon ignites desire. She glides up to the airy mezzanine bathroom, craving the space to play freely, and what begins as exploration soon becomes an electrifying dance of sight, sound and sensation. Each movement of her beautiful body intensifies the moment, as she follows her natural instincts. Then she sinks down to the tile floor, flushed and exhilarated, to savor its soothing coolness. Finally, it’s time for an unrushed, refreshing shower where she contemplates this perfect start to her day…
response.title: Morning Whip 2
